class CursorListItemProviderStub

Detailed Description

ListItemProvider that exposes data from a Cursor to a ListWidget widget.

The Cursor must include a column named "_id" or this class will not work.

Definition at line 27 of file CursorListItemProvider.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider::CursorListItemProvider ( gaia::core::Context *  context,
gaia::storage::Cursor *  cursor,
bool  autoRequery 
) [explicit]

Constructor that allows control over auto-requery.

Parameters:
cursorThe cursor from which to get the data.
contextThe context
autoRequeryIf true the adapter will call requery() on the cursor whenever it changes so the most recent data is always displayed. Using true here is discouraged.
virtual gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider::~CursorListItemProvider ( ) [virtual]

The destructor of CursorListItemProvider.

virtual gaia::base::String gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider::convertToString ( gaia::storage::Cursor *  cursor) [virtual]

Converts the cursor into a CharSequence.

Subclasses should override this method to convert their results. The default implementation returns an empty String for NULL values or the default String representation of the value.

Parameters:
cursorthe cursor to convert to a String
Returns:
a String representing the value

FilterQueryProvider* gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider::getFilterQueryProvider ( ) const

Returns the query filter provider used for filtering.

When the provider is NULL, no filtering occurs.

Returns:
the current filter query provider or NULL if it does not exist

void gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider::setFilterQueryProvider ( FilterQueryProvider *  filterQueryProvider)

Sets the query filter provider used to filter the current Cursor.

The provider's gaia::ui::FilterQueryProvider::runQueryN(const gaia::base::String&) method is invoked when filtering is requested by a client of this ListItemProvider.

Parameters:
filterQueryProviderthe filter query provider or NULL to remove it
See also:
getFilterQueryProvider()
virtual gaia::storage::Cursor* gaia::ui::CursorListItemProvider::swapCursor ( gaia::storage::Cursor *  newCursor) [virtual]

Swap in a new Cursor, returning the old Cursor.

Unlike changeCursor(gaia::storage::Cursor*), the returned old Cursor is not closed.

Parameters:
newCursorThe new cursor to be used.
Returns:
Returns the previously set Cursor, or NULL if there wasa not one. If the given new Cursor is the same instance is the previously set Cursor, NULL is also returned.

Reimplemented in gaia::ui::SimpleCursorListItemProvider.
